title: Suspicious PowerShell on workstation
description: User reported slowness. EDR flagged encoded PowerShell executing from temp directory. Possible downloader behavior. No confirmed outbound IOC provided.

title: Phishing email leading to credential reuse
description: Multiple users received phishing email mimicking SSO login. One account showed abnormal sign-in and MFA fatigue prompts. Possible credential theft.

title: Ransomware activity detected on file server
description: File server shows rapid file modifications and extension changes. Ransom note observed. Lateral movement suspected from a compromised admin account.

title: Possible DDoS on public API
description: Public API latency increased; traffic spikes from many IPs. WAF logs show repeated requests to /login and /search endpoints.

title: Suspicious outbound DNS to rare domains
description: DNS logs show hosts querying rare domains with randomized subdomains. Could indicate DNS tunneling or C2 over DNS.

title: Unauthorized admin access attempt
description: Several failed admin logins followed by a successful login from an unusual geo. No change tickets exist. Potential account compromise.
